description: Textual constructors for headings, paragraphs, code blocks and typography utilities

sprouts.name: sprout-heading
sprouts.description: Generic heading mixin with customizable size, weight and margin

sprouts.name: sprout-heading-uppercase
sprouts.description: Uppercase heading with letter spacing

sprouts.name: sprout-paragraph
sprouts.description: Generic paragraph mixin with customizable size and margin

sprouts.name: sprout-paragraph-muted
sprouts.description: Muted paragraph with secondary text color

sprouts.name: sprout-fluid-type
sprouts.description: Fluid typography that scales with viewport using clamp

sprouts.name: sprout-text-truncate
sprouts.description: Single line text truncation with ellipsis

sprouts.name: sprout-text-multiline
sprouts.description: Multi-line text truncation with line clamp

sprouts.name: sprout-code-block
sprouts.description: Code block styling with monospace font and background

sprouts.name: sprout-inline-code
sprouts.description: Inline code styling with monospace font and background

sprouts.name: sprout-heading-display
sprouts.description: Display heading with large size and black weight

sprouts.name: sprout-heading-hero
sprouts.description: Hero heading with extra large size and bold weight

sprouts.name: sprout-heading-section
sprouts.description: Section heading with 2xl size and bold weight

sprouts.name: sprout-heading-subsection
sprouts.description: Subsection heading with xl size and semibold weight

sprouts.name: sprout-heading-card
sprouts.description: Card heading with lg size and semibold weight

sprouts.name: sprout-text-lead
sprouts.description: Lead text with larger size and medium weight

sprouts.name: sprout-text-body
sprouts.description: Body text with standard paragraph styling

sprouts.name: sprout-text-caption
sprouts.description: Caption text with small size and muted color

sprouts.name: sprout-text-small
sprouts.description: Small text with extra small size and muted color

sprouts.name: sprout-text-highlight
sprouts.description: Highlighted text with background color and padding

sprouts.name: sprout-text-quote
sprouts.description: Quote text with left border and italic styling

sprouts.name: sprout-text-error
sprouts.description: Error text with error color and medium weight

sprouts.name: sprout-text-success
sprouts.description: Success text with success color and medium weight

sprouts.name: sprout-text-warning
sprouts.description: Warning text with warning color and medium weight

sprouts.name: sprout-code-inline
sprouts.description: Inline code with smaller font size

sprouts.name: sprout-code-block-large
sprouts.description: Large code block with medium padding and base font size

sprouts.name: sprout-code-block-small
sprouts.description: Small code block with extra small padding and font size

sprouts.description: Center text alignment

sprouts.name: sprout-text-left
sprouts.description: Left text alignment

sprouts.name: sprout-text-right
sprouts.description: Right text alignment

sprouts.description: Justified text alignment

sprouts.name: sprout-text-nowrap
sprouts.description: No-wrap white space

sprouts.description: Word break and overflow wrap for long words

sprouts.description: Responsive text that scales with viewport
